content:
It seems that I have successfully moved to the nearest iron ore resource position. Now, I will proceed to harvest iron ore to ensure both Stone Furnaces can operate efficiently.

# 1. Harvest 10 iron ores from the nearest iron ore resource.
harvest_resource(iron_ore_position, quantity=10)

# 2. After harvesting, I will check my inventory to confirm the amount of iron ore collected.
print(f"Inventory after harvesting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")
